review: We recently "Cut the cord" and Amazon Fire TV was our first consideration for internet based entertainment. It has all we the services we subscribe to and houses all our Prime pics, vids, and music as well. Super simple to hook up, operate, and navigate. This serves as a interface for TVs not equipped with smart tv technology. This product works amazingly. Since we were so pleased with the Fire TV, we have ordered Fire Sticks for the subsequent TVs in the other rooms. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. Another home run from Amazon.
